Medications Enhancing Anticoagulation and Coagulation

This section highlights specific medications that enhance anticoagulation and coagulation.


Anticoagulation

Heparin

Antithrombin III (Thrombate)

Direct Thrombin Inhibitors

Argatroban

Bivalirudin (Angiomax)

Aminocaproic Acid (Amicar)

Novoseven®
